title: Marry First, Love Later - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Blind Dates   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Famous Protagonist   First Love   Heartwarming   Marriage   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Short Story
author: Jiǔqiān Shèng   九千胜
description: Who says you can’t fall in love at first sight with your blind date?! An adorable internet celebrity streamer with a delicate, flexible and unparalleled body VS a good-looking, earnest, and serious university professor. A story about love after marriage.>
